item.title: Spandau Ballet - True - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song True by Spandau Ballet from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Am, Am7, Bm7, C, Cm7, D, Em, F, G.

item.title: Bing Crosby - White Christmas - Key of G# - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song White Christmas by Bing Crosby from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Am, Am7, B♭m♭5, C, Cm7, D, Em, G, G7.

item.title: Frank Sinatra - Fly Me To The Moon - Key of C - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Fly Me To The Moon by Frank Sinatra from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A7, Am7, Bm7-5, C, C7, Cmaj7, Dm7, E7, Em7, Em7-5, Fdim, Fmaj7, G7.
